badges.title: Gravis Guardian
badges.description: Issued to systems using Gravis Gamepad, Gravis UltraSound, or legacy joystick ports. A protector of pixel-bound warriors.
badges.visual_anchor: classic Gravis gamepad on textured deskmat

badges.title: Jaz Keeper
badges.description: Awarded for detection of Iomega Jaz Drive hardware. Large. Loud. Glorious.

emotional_resonance.trigger: Jaz drive or SCSI ZIP detected

badges.visual_anchor: translucent blue Jaz disk beside a thick SCSI ribbon

badges.title: SCSI Shaman
badges.description: Given to validators running legacy SCSI hardware. Recognized for resisting plug-and-pray.
badges.visual_anchor: Adaptec controller above chained drive tower

badges.title: Parallel Prophet
badges.description: Granted to validators with working LPT1 ports or legacy parallel printers. Never out of paper. Just out of time.
badges.visual_anchor: dot matrix printer ribbon draped over a DB25 cable
